name: ext_R4_PaymentReconciliation_detail
title: Cross-version Extension for R4.PaymentReconciliation.detail for use in FHIR R5
description: This cross-version extension represents PaymentReconciliation.detail from http://hl7.org/fhir/StructureDefinition/PaymentReconciliation|4.0.1 for use in FHIR R5.

element.definition: Distribution of the payment amount for a previously acknowledged payable.
element.comment: `PaymentReconciliation.detail` has no related element in R5:PaymentReconciliation
